titles.title: True Reciprocity Act of 2023
True Reciprocity Act of 2023
A bill to establish the principle of reciprocity in the relationship between the United States and the People's Republic of China, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
True Reciprocity Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of State to submit to Congress (1) a report comparing the manner in which the United States and China treat one another's diplomats and other officials, journalists, businesses, and nongovernmental associations; and (2) a strategy for addressing imbalances in such treatment.
